description.message: Send bugs to the author of a web page.

whatdone_placeholder.message: Try to give the steps to reproduce the observed behavior

whathad_placeholder.message: Try to be the most descriptive you can

whatshould_placeholder.message: What did you expected to have

security_label.message: many users could be harmed by this problem.

screenshot_alt.message: Screen capture of the bugged tab.

usermail_placeholder.message: Please enter your e-mail if you want to be warned when resolved

unsecure_label.message: Unsecure: Informations about this bug will be sent in an unsecure way. Check if it contains confidential informations.

bugreport_help.message: Copy/paste and mail it to the webmaster

error.message: Please, tells the webmaster something wrong with his bug report program
